name: Star Wars Flight Sim
description:
I fly FPV drones, love Star Wars and always wanted a flight sim that combined those two worlds.

I came across this awesome project at https://github.com/YuriyGulyak/RWS and remixed it by adding freely available assets found online, and submitted an early prototype for a Game Jam https://itch.io/jam/brackeys-4/rate/723649 

I have been adding to this project since then, such as including more ships and maps, essentially making it the dream flight sim I always wanted.

This is a flight sim so it will require a controller to be mapped under Settings, Control. It works with gamepads, HOTAS flight sticks and actual drone transmitters that Windows supports.

I also love VR and looking to port a VR version of this as well. Link to some test footage with my Rift, which I could also look to releasing if there is interest in it.

Feedback and comments welcome.
